Docs.summary: Provides designer functionality for user controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks There is no developer advantage to creating your own designer derived from UserControlDesigner. To enhance the design-time experience for a custom control, derive your control from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl> and your designer from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>. In that case, you would not use an .ascx file for your ASP.NET markup.
